dashboardr::enable_inputs()
```

dashboardr::enable_chart_export()
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
dashboardr::enable_sidebar()
```

```{r setup}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| error: false
#| results: 'hide'

# Load dashboardr (includes dplyr, highcharter as dependencies)
library(dashboardr)

# Global chunk options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  error = FALSE,
  fig.width = 12,
  fig.height = 8,
  dpi = 300
)

# Load data
data <- readRDS('dataset_small_600obs.rds')

# Data summary
cat('Dataset loaded:', nrow(data), 'rows,', ncol(data), 'columns\n')

```

## Workforce Composition

Pie, donut, and waffle charts show how the workforce is distributed.


<div style='height: 0.5rem;'></div>

### Employees by Department

```{r employees-by-department}
# Employees by Department
result <- viz_pie(
  data = data,
  title = "Employees by Department",
  x_var = "department",
  subtitle = "Click a slice to see details",
  color_palette = c("#4E79A7", "#F28E2B", "#E15759", "#76B7B2", "#59A14F"),
  sort_by_value = TRUE,
  cross_tab_filter_vars = c("department", "region")
)

# Enable chart export button
if (inherits(result, 'highchart')) {
  result <- highcharter::hc_exporting(result, enabled = TRUE)
}

result <- dashboardr:::.embed_cross_tab(result)

result
```

### Employees by Region

```{r employees-by-region}
# Employees by Region
result <- viz_pie(
  data = data,
  title = "Employees by Region",
  x_var = "region",
  subtitle = "Donut style with 50% inner cut-out",
  color_palette = c("#EDC948", "#B07AA1", "#FF9DA7", "#9C755F"),
  inner_size = "50%",
  cross_tab_filter_vars = c("department", "region")
)

# Enable chart export button
if (inherits(result, 'highchart')) {
  result <- highcharter::hc_exporting(result, enabled = TRUE)
}

result <- dashboardr:::.embed_cross_tab(result)

result
```
